title: Account Sharing - How to get this looked at?
body:
This player was just in my game. Twice in a row.  Her match history shows a pretty poor player. Suddenly 6 games in a row this player starts hard carrying... I mean like check out this image. And they are one after another non-stop. How do I get this looked at?

http://i67.tinypic.com/b3lt1s.png[/IMG]

replies.body:
open a support ticket
if you feel the report feature was not enough

I don't care enough to. I'm just pointing out obvious something is wrong with the system.

Just checked his user ID. Just went 27/5 as Trist. Totally normal...

> [{quoted}](name=FarRockBF,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uEggzp69,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-03T20:56:23.347+0000)
>
> I don't care enough to. I'm just pointing out obvious something is wrong with the system.
> 
> Just checked his user ID. Just went 27/5 as Trist. Totally normal...

Then nothing is going to happen.  Either you care enough to report via the actual methods or you don't and nothing will ever happen.

You care enough to look up their history, screenshot it, upload it, then make a forum thread about it but not to make a support ticket about it? 

To each their own I guess.
Why I would get down voted for mentioning and showing that someone is obviously abusing the system and ruining gameplay for many is bewildering.
Jungle... jinx lucian and vayne.... oh boy now I wanna try it
So if you don't care enough why would riot?
Jut finished a match with Twitch... 18/4
